totally_reset.title: Totally Reset Cursor
totally_reset.no_permission: Cannot Read or Write Config File, Please Check File Permissions
totally_reset.backup_exists: Backup File Already Exists, Skipping Backup Step
totally_reset.db_permission_error: Cannot access database file. Please check permissions
totally_reset.feature_1: Complete removal of Cursor AI settings and configurations
totally_reset.feature_2: Clears all cached data including AI history and prompts
totally_reset.feature_3: Resets machine ID to bypass trial detection
totally_reset.feature_6: Resets trial information and activation data
totally_reset.feature_7: Deep scan for hidden license and trial-related files
totally_reset.feature_8: Safely preserves non-Cursor files and applications
totally_reset.feature_9: Compatible with Windows, macOS, and Linux
totally_reset.disclaimer_1: This tool will permanently delete all Cursor AI settings,
totally_reset.disclaimer_2: configurations, and cached data. This action cannot be undone.
totally_reset.disclaimer_3: Your code files will NOT be affected, and the tool is designed
totally_reset.disclaimer_4: to only target Cursor AI editor files and trial detection mechanisms.
totally_reset.disclaimer_5: Other applications on your system will not be affected.
totally_reset.disclaimer_6: You will need to set up Cursor AI again after running this tool.
totally_reset.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to proceed?
totally_reset.confirm_1: This action will delete all Cursor AI settings,
totally_reset.confirm_2: configurations, and cached data. This action cannot be undone.
totally_reset.confirm_3: Your code files will NOT be affected, and the tool is designed
totally_reset.confirm_4: to only target Cursor AI editor files and trial detection mechanisms.
totally_reset.confirm_5: Other applications on your system will not be affected.
totally_reset.confirm_6: You will need to set up Cursor AI again after running this tool.
totally_reset.resetting_machine_id: Resetting machine identifiers to bypass trial detection...
totally_reset.resetting_cursor_ai_editor: Resetting Cursor AI Editor... Please wait.
totally_reset.reset_cancelled: Reset cancelled. Exiting without making any changes.
totally_reset.note_complete_machine_id_reset_may_requi: Note: Complete machine ID reset may require running as administrator
totally_reset.note_complete_system_machine_id_reset_ma: Note: Complete system machine-id reset may require sudo privileges
totally_reset.windows_registry_instructions: 📝 NOTE: For complete reset on Windows, you might also need to clean registry entries.
totally_reset.windows_registry_instructions_2: Run 'regedit' and search for keys containing 'Cursor' or 'CursorAI' under HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\ and delete them.
totally_reset.reset_log_1: Cursor AI has been fully reset and trial detection bypassed!
totally_reset.reset_log_2: Please restart your system for changes to take effect.
totally_reset.reset_log_3: You will need to reinstall Cursor AI and should now have a fresh trial period.
totally_reset.reset_log_5: Use a different email address when registering for a new trial
totally_reset.reset_log_6: If available, use a VPN to change your IP address
totally_reset.reset_log_7: Clear your browser cookies and cache before visiting Cursor AI's website
totally_reset.reset_log_8: If issues persist, try installing Cursor AI in a different location
totally_reset.reset_log_9: If you encounter any issues, go to Github Issue Tracker and create an issue at https://github.com/yeongpin/cursor-free-vip/issues
totally_reset.report_issue: Please report this issue to Github Issue Tracker at https://github.com/yeongpin/cursor-free-vip/issues
totally_reset.press_enter_to_return_to_main_menu: Press Enter to return to main menu...
totally_reset.performing_deep_scan: Performing deep scan for additional trial/license files
totally_reset.no_additional_license_trial_files_found_: No additional license/trial files found in deep scan
totally_reset.warning_1: This action will delete all Cursor AI settings,
totally_reset.warning_2: configurations, and cached data. This action cannot be undone.
totally_reset.warning_3: Your code files will NOT be affected, and the tool is designed
totally_reset.warning_4: to only target Cursor AI editor files and trial detection mechanisms.
totally_reset.warning_5: Other applications on your system will not be affected.
totally_reset.warning_6: You will need to set up Cursor AI again after running this tool.

totally_reset.deep_scanning: Performing deep scan for additional trial/license files

github_register.title: GitHub + Cursor AI Registration Automation
github_register.feature2: Registers a new GitHub account with random credentials.
github_register.feature4: Logs into Cursor AI using GitHub authentication.
github_register.feature5: Resets the machine ID to bypass trial detection.
github_register.feature6: Saves all credentials to a file.
github_register.warning1: This script automates account creation, which may violate GitHub/Cursor terms of service.
github_register.warning2: Requires internet access and administrative privileges.
github_register.warning3: CAPTCHA or additional verification may interrupt automation.
github_register.warning4: Use responsibly and at your own risk.
github_register.confirm: Are you sure you want to proceed?
github_register.credentials_saved: These credentials have been saved to github_cursor_accounts.txt
github_register.check_browser_windows_for_manual_interve: Check browser windows for manual intervention or try again later.
